about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY & FEATURES


  • Multi-choice, single-ending adventure strategy with 2+ hours of gameplay until credits
  • A more story-focused game with witty and sarcastic humor
  • Some stages include puzzles that might require creative thinking
  • Helpful hints and tutorials included, with a user-friendly UI design
  • Large map, and extra missions to enhance the adventure.

STORY

■ A Tale of Two Sisters
Switch between twin protagonists to navigate the perilous streets and tiered city walls of Fahran. Uncover secrets, and outwit foes in this “atelier-rific” doujin RPG.

■ The Story So Far...
On the outskirts of a remote frontier village lived two young sisters—Liz and Rose Lachester. Despite their renowned alchemist lineage and grueling childhood training, both have fallen into a life of laziness following the mysterious disappearance of their parents. Their carefree days soon come to a sudden end, however, when they find themselves saddled with crippling debt under an existing agreement with the shipowner Countess Remilia.

Desperate to escape their dire situation, they attempt a daring overnight flight, only to be captured by a military ship. Now branded as slaves using accursed ”emblem magic,” they are thrust into the unforgiving world of Fahran, a stratified city rife with intrigue and danger. Here, they must endure harsh labor and navigate its treacherous tiers to reclaim their freedom. Will these wayward sisters rise to the challenge, or will the city claim them as its own?

CHARACTERS


Liz Lachester
The older twin, full of cheer and boundless energy.
Though she lacks interest in alchemy, her physical prowess and adventurous spirit make her a force to be reckoned with.


Rose Lachester
The younger twin, serene and unhurried.
She prefers idleness over ambition, yet her mastery of magic and puppeteering makes her a subtle but formidable player in their quest.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains suggestive themes, mild violence, mild alcohol abuse, and crude language. No nudity is depicted, though some character designs may include revealing outfits and/or exaggerated physical features.

name: Liz and Rose's Alchemy Factory
